metadata.dc:author: Rioja Sanz, L A
Allepuz Losa, C
Fantova Alonso, A
Marco Valdenebro, A
Allué López, M
Serrano Frago, P
metadata.dc:description: The existence of prostate abscess as bad evolution of an acute protatitis is not very frequent due to the correct handling of the urinary infections by means of suitable antibiotics, in spite of the presence of inmunosupresion situations that can favor their appearance. It is our intention to review the performance in these situations because of a case that by means of minimal invasive therapy by transperineal percutaneous puncture obtained complete improvement.
metadata.dc:title: Actualidad en manejo de abcesos prostáticos: a propósito de un caso.
[The present time in handling of prostate abscesses: with regard to a case].
